/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the landscape.
